participant_1.background:
I live a simple life, working as a barista and spending my free time enjoying the outdoors or reading.
I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.
I'll be inside cleaning and my dogs will be outside playing in the fresh air.
I'm not a weather person.
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.

participant_2.background:
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.
my dog is my best friend.
i am 6 feet tall.
i love to go horseback riding.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am a barista at a coffee shop and I love it. What do you do for work?
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.
Wow, that's really interesting! How did you get into that?
I always loved animals, and after I quit my job I realized I wanted to do something that I was passionate about.
That's great! I'm sure you're very happy doing what you love.
I am, I love getting to work with animals every day.
What kind of pigs do you raise?
I raise a variety of pigs, including potbellied pigs, Kunekune pigs, and Vietnamese potbellied pigs.
Those all sound like very cute pigs!
They are! I love spending time with them.
I can see why! I have a dog and he is my best friend.
I love dogs too! I used to have a dog but he passed away a few years ago.
It's okay, I still have my pigs to keep me company.
That's good! I'm glad you have something to fill that void.
Yeah, I'm really happy with my life right now.
